text: Magnus Egilsson (born 19 March 1994) is a Faroese footballer who plays as a defender for Valur and the Faroe Islands national team. ==Career== Egilsson made his international debut for the Faroe Islands on 8 September 2019 in a UEFA Euro 2020 qualifying match against Spain, which finished as a 0–4 away loss. ==Career statistics== ===International=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !colspan=3|Faroe Islands |- !Year!!Apps!!Goals |- |2019||1||0 |- !Total!!1!!0 |} ==References== ==External links== * * * * Magnus Egilsson at FaroeSoccer.com Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Faroese footballers Category:Faroe Islands youth international footballers Category:Faroe Islands under-21 international footballers Category:Faroe Islands international footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Havnar Bóltfelag players Category:Argja Bóltfelag players Category:Faroe Islands Premier League players Category:1. deild players
title: Magnus Egilsson
